title: bejaminee2022
author: bejaminee2022
content: Hi, I'm writing my Extended Essay at school about Squid Coin's collapse and what it says about the cryptocurrency market. For my research I would like to ask Squid coin users to complete a really short survey (here: https://www.surveymonkey.co.uk/r/FBHH8PH). Please can you help me to find out how to contact squid coin users? I am struggling to find anyone to fill out my survey. Thankyou very much.

comments.author: bittick
comments.body: I know only the best place to get an audience for your survey. I meant this is not actually working but it's still worth to try https://t.me/SquidGameHoldersThat was an official telegrm group by shit squid scam coin. My question is did you mean this coin? https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/squid-game/ right? I just try to make sure if you are getting the right place to get the people who have been scammed by squid coin.

comments.author: vv181
comments.body: Based on the information from https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/squid-game/, the current Squid Game token is now handled by the community.So, you can join to their communities platform directly to reach out to the past or current users of Squid Game. Reaching out to the other community as you did here is also a good way to seek users, you may want to search for another cryptocurrencies-related platform, in case the Squid Game community lack of responses.Website: https://www.squidgameholders.club/#footerTelegram: https://t.me/SquidGameHoldersTwitter: https://twitter.com/squidholders

comments.author: Bitstar_coin
comments.body: What is surprising is the fact this coin is still active after what went down. If there are still people supporting this scam project, they deserve what they got.@OP am sure a lot of aggrieved investors will be willing to take part in your survey to speak about squid coin. I think you already have the right links. Food luck with your survey.

comments.author: KellyHands
comments.body: It's nice to know that educational essays are carried out considering the happenings in the cryptocurrency arena. It simply shows that cryptocurrency is gaining popularity and recognition outside this space. I wish you the best in your essay and hope you get all the information and help you need.

comments.author: yazher
comments.body: I think some of them are still here and hope that they will gonna see your topic and help you with their research. There's is only a little chance for you to get a legit reply from telegram as most people there will ignore any random DMs to them thinking that it will be another coin offering or scam. It's really nice to see someone make a report in such a case because you are not only giving people information but also you will gonna prevent them from doing the same mistakes. Good luck with your schoolwork, hope you will get an outstanding grade.

comments.author: ryzaadit
comments.body: In my opinion.Feel free to ask for some help to "CryptoCurrency" topic as well to gain more data, even it's not focused into "SQUID" there still has some chance you can find user or someone who has experience with the coin you're asking.Reddits could be the answer as well.

comments.author: abel1337
comments.body: I think you should create a new link for your survey because there might be a chance that someone from here might troll your survey and might messed up the data that the genuine SQUID coins user provides. I believe that you will get a very few of surveyee here about squid coin knowing that most of the users here has a good knowledge about crypto and won't risk their funds for that shtcoin. There are useful links above that guide you to the messaging app that SQUID coin community are using, It would be a great help.

comments.author: dansus021
comments.body: Quote from: Bitstar_coin on October 23, 2022, 07:43:25 PMWhat is surprising is the fact this coin is still active after what went down. If there are still people supporting this scam project, they deserve what they got.@OP am sure a lot of aggrieved investors will be willing to take part in your survey to speak about squid coin. I think you already have the right links. Food luck with your survey. because the project was very hyped and the people don't want to cutloss maybe become one of many reason the project still alive

comments.author: Fullcoinese
comments.body: Quote from: dansus021 on October 25, 2022, 02:44:17 AMQuote from: Bitstar_coin on October 23, 2022, 07:43:25 PMWhat is surprising is the fact this coin is still active after what went down. If there are still people supporting this scam project, they deserve what they got.@OP am sure a lot of aggrieved investors will be willing to take part in your survey to speak about squid coin. I think you already have the right links. Food luck with your survey. because the project was very hyped and the people don't want to cutloss maybe become one of many reason the project still alive whether it's despair or hope.if the holder provides enough capital. of course, with the current return, it will give nothing to the holder.What is clear is that in the group we can still see how there are still some holders who are excited about this project. but clearly, there is not much discussion there.OP might be able to visit the project community on their telegram account.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: bejaminee2022 on October 23, 2022, 01:56:00 PMPlease can you help me to find out how to contact squid coin users? I am struggling to find anyone to fill out my survey. Thankyou very much.Really shocking that there is someone who do like this kind of survey. But OP, I think you could try to go on their official website and join their socials. But I doubt that these users will still be active for example on telegram. Probably these member there are now just bots keep spamming. Its a dead coin that has been used for pump and dump so I guess its not that worthy anymore. But for the sake of your survey then go for it.
